Class Wege.ButtonAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • Wege.ButtonAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>
    Enclosing class:
    Wege

    public class Wege.ButtonAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>
    class which runs the necessary actions if a button on the board is clicked

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int buttonXPos
      Stores the x-coordinate of the button that was clicked on the board
      int buttonYPos
      Stores the y-coordinate of the button that was clicked on the board
      boolean legalMove
      determines whether the move that the players wants to make is legal
